short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto fetches and displays the KeKa time logs for exit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview: Keka Time Fetcher is an essential Chrome extension designed to help employees effortlessly track their attendance logs from the Keka HR platform. With just a single click, you can instantly view your effective working hours, check your accurate exit time, and stay on top of your attendance records.

Steps to Get the Extension:

- Click on the "Get Extension" button.
- Open the Chrome Web Store and click on "Add to Chrome" for the extension.
- Pin the "Leave Now" extension to your browser toolbar.
- How to Use:

Open the Keka website.
- Click on the "Me" menu and select "Attendance."
- Click on the "Leave Now" extension.
- Get Auto Calculated Leave Time.
- Features:

Instant Refresh: Quickly update your attendance logs to see the latest data.
- User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design, making it simple for anyone to use.
- Privacy-Focused: No personal data is stored or sharedâ€”everything stays within your browser.
- Benefits:

Save Time: Access your attendance logs directly from the browser.
- Stay Organized: Keep track of your working hours effortlessly.
- Improve Productivity: Monitor your overtime and pending hours regularly.
- This extension makes tracking your attendance simpler and more efficient, helping you stay on top of your work hours with ease!
